text: MiG-27 Flogger is a Soviet ground-attack aircraft. It first entered the Soviet Air Force in 1975. This plane's design is similar to the MiG-23. The MiG-27 was mostly used in the Soviet Union and it successor states. The Indian Air Force used the aircraft from 1984-2019 under a technology transfer agreement with the Soviet Union. Today, the Kazakh Air Force is the only remaining user of the MiG-27. ==References== Category:Soviet military aircraft Category:Indian military aircraft
title: Mikoyan MiG-27
